abstract: Graham Anderson, a former chief designer for one of the most visible property developers in the emirate, sees a tourist market for Herbie, the Volkswagen Beetle featured in the Disney movie franchise.
snippet: Graham Anderson, a former chief designer for one of the most visible property developers in the emirate, sees a tourist market for Herbie, the Volkswagen Beetle featured in the Disney movie franchise.

headline.main: Architect Hopes to Build a Dubai Home for Herbie the Love Bug
